row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PRV.JOB.CHANGE_ISSUE_STATUS@GENERIC
row.description: Change status of an Issue in Jira

row.process:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.COMMON_LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Issue ID or Key" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID_KEY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target Status" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_TARGET_STATUS#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Resolution" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_RESOLUTION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Assignee" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_ASSIGNEE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Comment" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_COMMENT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "ChangeIssueStatusAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
! Issue id or key : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID_KEY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -issueid &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Target status of Issue : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_TARGET_STATUS# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -targetstatus &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
!--------------------------------------------------Building json file contents------------------------------------------------
: SET &SEPARATOR# = ' ' : SET &UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS# ="" : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = '{ "transition": { "id": "transition_id" }'
! Resolution : IF &UC4RB_JIRA_RESOLUTION# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_PARAM_VALUE# = &UC4RB_JIRA_RESOLUTION# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_JSON_OBJECT &UC4RB_PARAM_NAME# = 'name' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_JSON &UC4RB_FIELD_NAME# = 'resolution' : ENDIF
! Assignee : IF &UC4RB_JIRA_ASSIGNEE# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_PARAM_VALUE# = &UC4RB_JIRA_ASSIGNEE# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_JSON_OBJECT &UC4RB_PARAM_NAME# = 'name' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_JSON &UC4RB_FIELD_NAME# = 'assignee' : ENDIF
! Custom fields : IF &UC4RB_JIRA_CUSTOM_FIELDS# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS# = STR_CAT(' &UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS#',' , ') : SET &UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS# = STR_CAT('&UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS# ','&UC4RB_JIRA_CUSTOM_FIELDS#') : ENDIF
!Checking Json contents and if not null add it to the file contents as proper json : IF &UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS# = STR_CAT('"fields":','{&UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS#}') : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#,',') : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#,&UC4RB_JSON_CONTENTS#) : ENDIF
! Add comment : IF &UC4RB_JIRA_COMMENT# NE "" : SET &UC4RB_PARAM_VALUE# = &UC4RB_JIRA_COMMENT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_JSON_OBJECT &UC4RB_PARAM_NAME# = 'body' : SET &UC4RB_PARAM_VALUE# = &UC4RB_FIELD_VALUE# : SET &UC4RB_FIELD_VALUE# = STR_CAT('"add":','&UC4RB_FIELD_VALUE#') : SET &UC4RB_FIELD_VALUE# = STR_CAT('"comment":','[{&UC4RB_FIELD_VALUE#}]') : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#,',') : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#,'"update":{&UC4RB_FIELD_VALUE#}') : ENDIF
!Closing paranthesis : SET &UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_FILE_CONTENT#,'}') !----------------------------------------------Building json file contents (end)----------------------------------------------------
! write to a file : SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,"changeissuestatus-&$RUNID#.json") : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE : SET &DELETEFILE# = 1
: PUBLISH &UC4RB_FILE_PATH#,,"TASK" : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -jsonfilepath &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# ")
: PRINT &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Invoking java binary : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" : CASE "UNIX" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CHANGE ISSUE STATUS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CHANGE ISSUE STATUS ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
